activities: We are a web hosting company. Information received from customers or prospects is used solely for purposes of providing such services to our customers. Personal data, excluding credit card inforamtion, is stored on SSL-secured servers that can be accessed only by appropriate MMA staff members and the respective customer's administrator. No information is shared with third parties, except as noted in our Privacy Policy.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Slovenia, Slovakia, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Internal resolution procedures and/or EU data protection authorities.
